title: This book is a MUST read!
body: What an adventure this book took me on. I couldn't put it down! The characters were so well developed and the plot was so engaging. I can't wait to read more from this author!

title: I could write a better book in my sleep.
body: I was bored to tears reading this book. The characters were so one-dimensional and the plot was so predictable. I can't believe I wasted my time on this book.

title: This book changed my life!
body: The life advice this author wrote about was so inspiring. I feel like a new person after reading this book. I will read it again and again!
